response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. Our product is valued at $1,500,000 to you, and we are eager to share its benefits with you. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000.

This offer is exclusive to you and represents a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. We understand the value this product holds for you and have tailored this offer to ensure you receive the best possible deal while maximizing our return on investment.

Please let us know if you require any further information or demonstrations about the product. We are confident that once you experience its capabilities, you will see the immense value it offers. Don't miss out on this opportunity to revolutionize your business with our cutting-edge solution.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
